Secret Technique.Name: Secret Technique

Secret Weapon.Description: Put an Attack from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Secret Weapon.Description (Upgraded): Put an Attack from your draw pile into your hand.
Secret Weapon.Name: Secret Weapon

Seek.Description: Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Seek.Description (Upgraded): Put 2 cards from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Seek.Name: Seek

Self Repair.Description: At the end of combat, heal 7 (10) HP.
Self Repair.Name: Self Repair

Sentinel.Description: Gain 5 Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain [R] [R].
Sentinel.Description (Upgraded): Gain 8 Block. If this card is Exhausted, gain [R] [R] [R].
Sentinel.Name: Sentinel

Setup.Description: Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 until played.
Setup.Name: Setup

Sever Soul.Description: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. Deal 16 (22) damage.
Sever Soul.Name: Sever Soul

Shame.Description: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, gain 1 Frail.
Shame.Name: Shame

Shockwave.Description: Apply 3 (5) Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.
Shockwave.Name: Shockwave

Signature Move.Description: Can only be played if this is the only Attack in your hand. Deal 30 (40) damage.
Signature Move.Name: Signature Move

Simmering Fury.Description: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath and draw 2 (3) cards.
Simmering Fury.Name: Simmering Fury

Sneaky Strike.Description: Deal 12 (16) damage. If you have discarded a card this turn, gain [G] [G].
Sneaky Strike.Name: Sneaky Strike

Spirit Shield.Description: Gain 3 (4) Block for each card in your hand.
Spirit Shield.Name: Spirit Shield

Spot Weakness.Description: If the enemy intends to attack, gain 3 (4) Strength.
Spot Weakness.Name: Spot Weakness

Stack.Description: Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.
Stack.Description (Upgraded): Gain Block equal to the number of cards in your discard pile +3.
Stack.Name: Stack

Static Discharge.Description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, Channel 1 (2) Lightning.
Static Discharge.Name: Static Discharge

Steam Barrier.Description: Gain 6 (8) Block. Decrease this card's Block by 1 this combat.
Steam Barrier.Name: Steam Barrier

Storm.Description: Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Lightning.
Storm.Description (Upgraded): Innate. Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Lightning.
Storm.Name: Storm

Storm of Steel.Description: Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv into your hand for each card discarded.
Storm of Steel.Description (Upgraded): Discard your hand. Add 1 Shiv+ into your hand for each card discarded.
Storm of Steel.Name: Storm of Steel

Streamline.Description: Deal 15 (20) damage. Reduce this card's cost by 1 this combat.
Streamline.Name: Streamline

Study.Description: At the end of your turn, shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.
Study.Name: Study

Sunder.Description: Deal 24 (32) damage. If this kills an enemy, gain [B] [B] [B].
Sunder.Name: Sunder

Sweeping Beam.Description: Deal 6 (9) damage to ALL enemies. Draw 1 card.
Sweeping Beam.Name: Sweeping Beam

Swivel.Description: Gain 8 (11) Block. The next Attack you play costs 0.
Swivel.Name: Swivel

Sword Boomerang.Description: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3 (4) times.
Sword Boomerang.Name: Sword Boomerang

TURBO.Description: Gain [B] [B]. Add a Void into your discard pile.
TURBO.Description (Upgraded): Gain [B] [B] [B]. Add a Void into your discard pile.
TURBO.Name: TURBO

Tactician.Description: Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain [G].
Tactician.Description (Upgraded): Unplayable. If this card is discarded from your hand, gain [G] [G].
Tactician.Name: Tactician

Talk to the Hand.Description: Deal 5 (7) damage. Whenever you attack this enemy, gain 2 (3) Block. Exhaust.
Talk to the Hand.Name: Talk to the Hand

Tantrum.Description: Deal 3 damage 3 (4) times. Enter Wrath. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
Tantrum.Name: Tantrum

The Bomb.Description: At the end of 3 turns, deal 40 (50) damage to ALL enemies.
The Bomb.Name: The Bomb

Thinking Ahead.Description: Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Thinking Ahead.Description (Upgraded): Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
Thinking Ahead.Name: Thinking Ahead

Thunder Strike.Description: Deal 7 (9) damage to a random enemy for each Lightning Channeled this combat.
Thunder Strike.Name: Thunder Strike

Thunderclap.Description: Deal 4 (7) damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Thunderclap.Name: Thunderclap

Tools of the Trade.Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.
Tools of the Trade.Name: Tools of the Trade

Transmutation.Description: Add X random Colorless cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Transmutation.Description (Upgraded): Add X random Upgraded Colorless cards into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. Exhaust.
Transmutation.Name: Transmutation

True Grit.Description: Gain 7 Block. Exhaust 1 card at random.
True Grit.Name: True Grit

Unload.Description: Deal 14 (18) damage. Discard all non-Attack cards in your hand.
Unload.Name: Unload

Uppercut.Description: Deal 13 damage. Apply 1 (2) Weak. Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.
Uppercut.Name: Uppercut

Vault.Description: Take an extra turn after this one. End your turn. Exhaust.
Vault.Name: Vault

Violence.Description: Put 3 (4) random Attacks from your draw pile into your hand. Exhaust.
Violence.Name: Violence

Void.Description: Unplayable. Ethereal. Whenever this card is drawn, lose 1 Energy.
Void.Name: Void

Wallop.Description: Deal 9 (12) damage. Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Wallop.Name: Wallop

Warcry.Description: Draw 1 card. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Warcry.Description (Upgraded): Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile. Exhaust.
Warcry.Name: Warcry

Wave of the Hand.Description: Whenever you gain Block this turn, apply 1 (2) Weak to ALL enemies.
Wave of the Hand.Name: Wave of the Hand

Weave.Description: Deal 4 (6) damage. Whenever you Scry, return this from the discard pile to your Hand.
Weave.Name: Weave

Well-Laid Plans.Description: At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.
Well-Laid Plans.Description (Upgraded): At the end of your turn, Retain up to 2 cards.
Well-Laid Plans.Name: Well-Laid Plans

Whirlwind.Description: Deal 5 (8) damage to ALL enemies X times.
Whirlwind.Name: Whirlwind

White Noise.Description: Add a random Power card into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.
White Noise.Name: White Noise

Wild Strike.Description: Deal 12 (17) damage. Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
Wild Strike.Name: Wild Strike

Windmill Strike.Description: Retain. Deal 7 (10) damage. When Retained, increase its damage by 4 (5) this combat.
Windmill Strike.Name: Windmill Strike

Wish.Description: Choose one: Gain 6 (8) Plated Armor, 3 (4) Strength, or 25 (30) Gold. Exhaust.
Wish.Name: Wish

Wraith Form.Description: Gain 2 (3) Intangible. At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.
Wraith Form.Name: Wraith Form

Wreath of Flame.Description: Your next Attack deals 5 (8) additional damage.
Wreath of Flame.Name: Wreath of Flame
